entity_suffix.title: Entity ID Suffix
entity_suffix.description:
Enter a suffix that will be used in entity names.

**Example with default suffix:**
`sensor.cez_hdo_lowtariffstart_{example_entity}`

**Example with custom suffix** (e.g. `cottage`):
`sensor.cez_hdo_lowtariffstart_cottage`

You can change the suffix to better distinguish multiple devices.

data_description.entity_suffix: Suffix added to all entity IDs (you can enter custom text, e.g. cottage, apartment, house)
